oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pampered Parrot Haven, Inc. A New and Special Kind of Aviary
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abbandondelo, Bob
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It's fitting that Pampered Parrot Haven, Inc. be situated in the Town of Oyster Bay, Long Island, New York. Thar's where Teddy Roosevelt called home. Teddy was a sincerely dedicated wildlife and environmental conservationist. The Teddy Roosevelt bird sanctuary, located near the Roosevelt home, is a tribute to Teddy's early conservation efforts. Today, a man named Paul Gildersleeve, a life-long Oyster Bay resident, is following in Teddy's footsteps with the opening of a special kind of aviary.
